name: HALDER INSTITUTE OF CAREER MAKING
briefDescription: We trained the candidates (SC/ST/OBC/General) under MSME & MES (Govt. of India) last years & also providing the training of soft skill (Spoken English), Beautician, Computer IT Programe, Tailoring etc to literate through our Institution Independently without any Aid still date. We had also taken part an active role to help those people who are affected in the time of Aila & flooded area in Jummu Kashmir. We also Celebrate National & International Days like Independence Day, Republic Day, World Aids Day, World Environmental Day etc. We also Organized Blood Donation Camp & free Health Checkup Camp. We also Distribute Book & Cloth to help the poor people.
